title: Embertone - Mouth Trumpet
description:
One part fun, two parts crazy and totally @#%$ing weird... Now with just one virtual instrument you can infuse some humor into your music, mock the brass trumpet, confuse your family and friends, all while enjoying strange animation on the main page of the interface
Mouth trumpet is a vocal technique that imitates the sound of the trumpet.
The mouth trumpet sound is produced by using the vocal cords to produce the desired pitch and passing the sound through the lips that are held together with just enough tension so that they vibrate at the same frequency as the vocal cords, producing a trumpet-like sound.
----------
This instrument is smooth, quirky, and we know you'll have a ball with it. Oh - and along with Mouth Trumpet, we made a bunch of fun FX patches that we think you'll love... So have fun and happy composing!

A crazy person who can make trumpet sounds with his mouth
A bunch of NKI files
860 recorded samples
250 MB installed, 140 MB loaded, 240 MB .rar download
Download from our Amazon S3 Server!
Sample resolution: 44.1 Khz / 24-bit stereo
Kontakt 4.2 (Full Retail) is 32/64-bit, MAC/PC compatible
Note: Native Instruments Kontakt version 4.2 or later full retail versions required..
Note: Free Kontakt Player will only work for 15 minutes with this product. Full version required to remove this restriction.
